= Class *jplex.common.Config*  =

== Description ==
The common configuration object that is used in the Component class



== Methods ==                                
|| *Signature* || *Return Type* || *Description* ||
|| `each(fCallback)` || `void` || Iterate over the configuration<br />  - `fCallback <Function>` with a single argument: an object with two properties <em>key</em> and <em>value</em>||
|| `get(sName)` || `Object` || Get the value of the conf. parameter<br />  - `sName <String>` parameter's name||
|| `set(sName, mValue)` || `void` || Sets the value of the conf. parameter, if the parameter already exists it will be replaced<br />  - `sName <String>` parameter's name - `mValue <object>` new value||
